titles.title: To amend the Department of Education Organization Act to establish an Assistant Secretary for Community and Junior Colleges.
To amend the Department of Education Organization Act to establish an Assistant Secretary for Community and Junior Colleges.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce
committee.subcommittee: Higher Education and Workforce Development Subcomittee

term.name: Advice and consent of the Senate

bill.summary:
Amends the Department of Education Organization Act to establish an Assistant Secretary for Community and Junior Colleges.
Repeals provisions for a Liaison for Community and Junior Colleges.
